item.title: Contact form 1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Your Name (required)
[text* your-name]

Your Email (required)
[email* your-email]

Website [text* website]

Select menu: [select menu-422 "Starter" "Business" "Premium" "V.I.P"]

Checkboxes: [checkbox checkbox-468 "item 1" "item 2" "item 3"]

Radio buttons: [radio radio-772 "item 1" "item 2" "item 3"]

Number of items: [number Numberspinbox min:0 max:1000 step:1 "0"]

Your Message
[textarea your-message]

[submit class:dt-btn-m "Send message"]

Contact form from demostand [your-name] Message body: [your-message] -- This mail sent from http://the7.dream-demo.com/ irina@forge.com.ua 1 Your message was sent successfully. Thanks. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Validation errors occurred. Please confirm the fields and submit it again. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Please accept the terms to proceed. Please fill the required field. Your entered code is incorrect. Date format seems invalid. This date is too early. This date is too late. Failed to upload file. This file type is not allowed. This file is too large. Failed to upload file. Error occurred. Number format seems invalid. This number is too small. This number is too large. Your answer is not correct. Email address seems invalid. URL seems invalid. Telephone number seems invalid.

item.title: Untitled
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Your Name (required)

Your Email (required)
[email* your-email]

Subject

Telephone
[tel tel-745]

Number (spinbox)
[number number-997]

Number (slider)
[range range-854]

Date
[date date-506]

File upload
[file file-349]

Checkboxes
[checkbox checkbox-777 "1" "2" "3"]

Radio buttons
[radio radio-284 "1" "2" "3"]

Acceptance
[acceptance acceptance-672]

Quiz
[quiz quiz-950]

Drop-down menu
[select menu-72]

URL
[url url-902]

Your Message
[textarea your-message]

[submit "Send"]
